column1: 8G. Where any draft development plan has been approved by the Minister, it shall be the
duty of the Authority as soon as may be after such approval
(a) to cause a notice to be published in the Gazette and in a daily newspaper in
the Sinhala, Tamil and English languages circulating in the development area or
part  thereof  to  which  the  development  plan  relates,  to  the  effect  that  the
development plan has been approved by the Minister and that it shall come into
operation on the date of the publication of the notice in the Gazette; and
